channel.title: What is Near Realities base client?
channel.description: I'm just wondering because I love there npc graphics and animations and some reason they have a godwars dungeon on their server, yet I go to the coor and I don't have one, so I'm just wondering whats Near Reality's base client they used.

item.title: What is Near Realities base client?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:8, topic:465455”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=570678.msg4138390#msg4138390 date=1351908018]
Their client is based off of that. You’re not going to be able to download and expect the same client.
[/quote]
I would like the client to have the graphics and npcs that are similar to near reailty…thats all[/quote]
Then download theirs and rip stuff from it. It would take a long long time though considering how heavily it was edited and customized.

Read full topic
item.source: What is Near Realities base client?
